eduversum.name: Chemtool
eduversum.description: Chemtool is a 2D-Molecule editor, in which you can compose organic molecules or import molecules in mol and pdb format, (the imported molecules can be edited. 3D-Molecules can be also imported and transformed into 2D-versions). The created molecules can be exported in various formats. (The program possesses a help program with which you can determinate the sum formulas and calculate the mol-masses.)
